author: rjmholt
body:
The `Save-Help` tests for compressed assets are failing on Alpine Linux:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/5b82b767558f682fef3ec53b5e5955981c2183ec/test/powershell/engine/Help/UpdatableHelpSystem.Tests.ps1#L333

Error message:

```
Expected 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core_00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000_en-US_HelpContent.zip', because Save-Help for  should download 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core_00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000_en-US_HelpContent.zip', but got $null.
```

second failure:

```
Expected 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility_1da87e53-152b-403e-98dc-74d7b4d63d59_en-US_helpcontent.zip', because Save-Help for  should download 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility_1da87e53-152b-403e-98dc-74d7b4d63d59_en-US_helpcontent.zip', but got $null.
```
title: Save-Help tests failing on Alpine
